trigger.title: Trigger: Cured Zombie Villager
trigger.description: Triggers when the player cures a zombie villager.

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: Object containing conditions that need to be met when the trigger gets activated. The criterion is marked completed when the trigger activates and all conditions passed.

anyOf.description: Specifies a list of predicates that must pass in order for the criterion to be granted. The checks are applied to the villager, with the origin being the position of the player that would get the advancement.
The villager that is the result of the conversion. The 'type' tag is redundant since it will always be 'villager'.

Specifies a list of predicates that must pass in order for the criterion to be granted. The checks are applied to the zombie villager, with the origin being the position of the player that would get the advancement.
The zombie villager right before the conversion is complete (not when it is initiated). The 'type' tag is redundant since it will always be 'zombie_villager'.
